channel.title: Let's revisit Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
channel.description: Yep, let's get on live and play this game, specifically co-op. If anyone has this, hit me up.

item.title: Let's revisit Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Ha ha!

It was cool with our two personalities. It was almost like Kane and Lynch. I was the guy more concerned with stealth and less death. You had the “If it isn’t noisy or lethal, it doesn’t work” approach.

Read full topic
item.source: Let's revisit Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

item.title: Let's revisit Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
Winged One:

Well, that was a failure. I think we should focus on being a little more stealthy, tbh. It got kinda messy what with the four alarms and the 9 widows we created.

Oh, and then it froze. Awesome. Still fun, though.

A whole damn bank full of armed Mexicans, and not a fucking spare clip of rifle bullets!

Read full topic
